## UX Benchmarking Template 🎯

## Introduction 📝

Welcome to our UX Benchmarking Template! This is a method used to measure the usability and user experience of a product over time or compared to competitors.

---

## Components 📋

**Define Goals** 🎯

*   What aspects of the user experience are we interested in benchmarking? This could be task completion, satisfaction, efficiency, etc.

**Identify Competitors** 🏁

*   If doing competitive benchmarking, identify the competitors you want to benchmark against.

**Select Tasks** 📝

*   Choose a set of tasks that users would typically perform with your product. These tasks should be relevant to your goals.

**Conduct User Testing** 👥

*   Have users perform the tasks while you observe and record metrics related to your goals.

**Analyze Results** 📊

*   Analyze the data to identify trends, strengths, and areas for improvement.

---

## Guidelines 📚

*   **Consistency** 🔄: To accurately track changes over time, keep the tasks and metrics consistent across different rounds of benchmarking.
*   **User-Centered** 👥: Choose participants who represent your actual users to get the most relevant results.
*   **Objective Metrics** 🧮: Use objective, quantifiable metrics to measure performance.

---

## Resources 📚

*   User Testing Platform
*   Data Analysis Tool

---

## Conclusion 🏁

Thank you for your participation in this UX Benchmarking exercise. Your insights will help us track our performance over time and identify opportunities to improve the user experience.

---

Remember, this is just a template. Feel free to modify it to suit your needs. Happy benchmarking! 🎉
